title: Tyson Fury: Drainpipe sculpture of boxer unveiled in Morecambe
description: The Morecambe artwork "depicts the essence of the punch", the sculptor says.

title: Bob Dole: From WW2 casualty to top Republican
description: Long-serving senator, who recovered from terrible injuries to run for president, dies at 98

title: Banksy pledges to help save Reading jail with stencil sale
description: The artist offers to raise £10m to buy the former prison so it can become an arts hub.

title: Arthur Labinjo-Hughes: National inquiry into boy's death
description: Lessons will be learnt to protect other children from such evil crimes, the government says.

title: Pope condemns treatment of migrants in Europe
description: Visiting a camp in Greece, Francis called on Europe to take responsibility for the situation.

title: Storm Arwen: Business secretary says power cuts unacceptable
description: The electricity supplier for the North East says 3,900 homes are still without power.

title: Trump social media firm raises $1bn from investors
description: The former US president is working to launch a social media app called Truth Social early next year.

title: Covid travel test changes a 'hammer blow' to industry
description: The return of pre-departure Covid tests for travellers to the UK will come into force on 04:00 GMT Tuesday.

title: Hand cycling has given me my freedom back
description: Amputee Neil Russell is planning to embark on a challenge to cycle around Scotland on his hand bike.

title: India Nagaland: Security forces kill 13 civilians amid ambush blunder
description: Home Minister Amit Shah expresses "anguish" after troops fire on miners in the country's north-east.

title: Prince William reveals emotional toll of air ambulance rescues
description: The Duke of Cambridge recalls taking home other people's "sadness" when he was a pilot.

title: Head and Starc to play in first Ashes Test
description: Middle-order batter Travis Head and left-arm bowler Mitchell Starc will play for Australia in the first Ashes Test against England in Brisbane on Wednesday.

title: World War Two pilot backs campaign to honour photographic unit
description: Campaigners call for a memorial to members of an RAF reconnaissance unit who died in World War Two.

title: I'm A Celebrity: 'Keep show in UK to help climate change'
description: ITV is urged to "set an example" by not flying celebrities to Australia and to base itself in Wales.

title: Norwich: 'Mr Christmas' installs 16,000 lights on his house
description: Mark Abbott is raising money for a charity that helped him when he was homeless 15 years ago.

title: Newspaper headlines: Covid pill rollout, and families' 'fury' at No 10
description: Sunday's papers include reports the first at-home Covid treatment could be offered before Christmas.

title: Indonesia volcano: Rescuers race to find survivors of Indonesia eruption
description: At least 13 people are dead and dozens injured after Mt Semeru erupted on Indonesia's Java island.

title: Afghanistan: Taliban warned against targeting former security forces
description: US and allies "deeply concerned" about human rights abuses against former Afghan security forces.

title: Women's FA Cup final: The preparation and superstition
description: Radio 1 Newsbeat speaks to Chelsea stars Erin Cuthbert and Millie Bright about the final.

title: Pacific Ocean garbage patch is immense plastic habitat
description: Researchers discover coastal species living on debris miles from their natural surroundings.

title: Mandatory vaccinations: Three reasons for and against
description: Blanket vaccination mandates are on the agenda but do they work and what are their costs?

title: Chris Cuomo: CNN fires presenter over help he gave politician brother
description: The star TV host is sacked over efforts to help his brother defend himself against sexual harassment claims.

title: 'I balanced a Mini on my head'
description: A head balancer wants to break his 100th world record before retirement.

title: South Africa: The rape survivor who convicts rapists
description: Rape survivor Sgt Catherine Tladi has secured several convictions for rape in South Africa's courts.

title: Grenfell Tower: Hamilton says F1 deal with firm nothing to do with him
description: His F1 team Mercedes has been criticised for partnering with Kingspan, a firm linked to Grenfell Tower.
